hero.subtitle: Dive into a world of 8-bit adventure and retro gaming magic!
hero.description: Building innovative solutions at the intersection of AI, web development, and user experience.

features.title: SHOWCASE
features.subtitle: Discover what makes Prism Pioneer the ultimate retro gaming experience
features.gamingDesc: Experience the golden age of arcade gaming with authentic 8-bit graphics and sound.
features.leaderboardsDesc: Compete with players worldwide and climb the ranks to become the ultimate champion.
features.unlockablesDesc: Discover hidden secrets and unlock special characters, power-ups, and achievements.
features.fastPacedDesc: Non-stop action with quick gameplay sessions perfect for both casual and hardcore gamers.
features.soundtrackDesc: Immerse yourself in nostalgic chiptune music and authentic arcade sound effects.
features.communityDesc: Join a passionate community of retro gaming enthusiasts and share your adventures.

hero.name: DotJumpDot
hero.subtitle: Prism Pioneer
hero.description: Building innovative solutions at the intersection of AI, web development, and user experience.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: Creative Developer • AI Enthusiast • Problem Solver
about.storyText1: Hello! I'm DotJumpDot, a passionate developer dedicated to building innovative solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.
about.storyText2: My journey in development started with a fascination for interactive experiences and has evolved into a deep expertise in modern web technologies and AI integration. I believe that great software is a blend of technical excellence and creative vision.
about.storyText3: Currently, I focus on building tools that enhance developer productivity—like my VS Code extensions—and exploring the potential of AI through platforms like Axiomancer.
